trends: There has been one other sighting in Gdansk
There were no other sightings in Gdansk on or around February 24th 2006
divs: Sighting Details1. At home, trying to sleep, then looking out of the roof-window 2. strange object moving on a sky, clearly visible through the window 3. laser projection from a nearby dico, but it was definitely not that 4. Triangle frame, with three round shapes on the joints, looking like the top of the Tree of Sefirot (kabbala), surrounded by kind of tunic, all delicately lighten in red or orange shades. Object was moving from south to north without noise, apparently not very high, or being very large. 5. Opening the window, assuring that it was not any light reflection then amusement and kind of fear and anxiety. 6. It flew away in its direction
Summary: triangle frame with three ball-shapes, moving south to north
